Docs.summary: Represents the host portion of a Uri can be used to construct Uri's properly formatted and encoded for use in HTTP headers.

Docs.summary: Creates a new HostString without modification. The value should be Unicode rather than punycode, and may have a port. IPv4 and IPv6 addresses are also allowed, and also may have ports.

Docs.summary: Returns the value properly formatted and encoded for use in a URI in a HTTP header. Any Unicode is converted to punycode. IPv6 addresses will have brackets added if they are missing.
